mapper.sql: t.id, t.activity_id, t.uid, t.no, t.serial_no, t.issue_time, t.create_time, t.update_time
mapper.select:
SELECT t.uid uid, t.real_name realName, t.uname uname, t1.issue_time issueTime FROM t_user_result t LEFT JOIN t_certificate_issue t1 ON t.activity_id = t1.activity_id AND t.uid = t1.uid WHERE t.activity_id = #{queryParam.activityId} AND t.qualified_status = 1
AND ( t.real_name LIKE concat('%', #{queryParam.sw}, '%') OR t.uname LIKE concat('%', #{queryParam.sw}, '%') )
AND t1.issue_time IS NOT NULL
AND t1.issue_time IS NULL
ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_certificate_issue ( activity_id, uid, no, serial_no, issue_time ) VALUES
( #{value.activityId}, #{value.uid}, #{value.no}, #{value.serialNo}, #{value.issueTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN MAX( t.serial_no ) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE MAX( t.serial_no ) END FROM t_certificate_issue t WHERE t.activity_id = #{activityId}
